definition.argsxml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="args_start" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><next><block type="literal"><field name="name">add</field><statement name="args"><block type="number_min"><field name="name">time</field><field name="min">0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">If the player uses a number, we set the time to this number.</comment><statement name="args"><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure"></field></block></statement></block></statement><next><block type="literal"><field name="name">set</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">The player can also use pre-defined options. Each literal argument is one option and each of them can execute a different code. However, unlike other parameters, this argument can not be get in procedure as their name is their value.</comment><statement name="args"><block type="literal"><field name="name">day</field><statement name="args"><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure"></field></block></statement><next><block type="literal"><field name="name">noon</field><statement name="args"><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure"></field></block></statement><next><block type="literal"><field name="name">night</field><statement name="args"><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure"></field></block></statement><next><block type="literal"><field name="name">midnight</field><statement name="args"><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure"></field></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
